description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Chengdu, China. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Vibrant Chengdu High-Tech District Stay with Three Bars & Restaurants
hotels.description: Feel instantly at home in the heart of Chengdu at this stylish abode, offering a blend of Eastern hospitality and Western comfort. Hyatt House Chengdu Peddle Walk offers spacious rooms and suites that are perfect for city breaks and extended adventures, with views of Chengdu's evolving skyline. Fuel your Sichuan exploration at Gallery Kitchen with a full breakfast spread before heading out. Located in the buzzing Shiyangchang District, you're steps from Pebble Walk's high-end shopping paradise and a short drive from Chengdu's centre. With Tianfu Square and Wuhou Temple awaiting exploration, you're all set to experience the city's contemporary energy and timeless charm.

hotels.title: Stylish Chengdu City Escape near CBD with Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Discover the dynamic spirit of Chengdu in Sichuan Province with a stay at this stylish retreat located just south of Chengdu CBD, tucked away in the technology district. Start your day with a hearty breakfast at the Gallery Restaurant, grab a quick bite from H Market or unwind with drinks and light nibbles at H Bar - perfect for on-the-go lifestyles. When you're ready to explore, you’ll be positioned near Chengdu’s top attractions, from the world-famous panda sanctuary to the colossal New Century Global Center, offering endless dining, shopping and entertainment options.

hotels.title: Ultra-Modern China Chengdu City Break in Bio-Town with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the charm of China's Sichuan province with a stay at this peaceful base set at the edge of Chengdu's forward-thinking Bio-Town. Surrounded by greenery, lakeside trails and forest paths, days here involve quiet strolls and urban exploration at sights like Yong'an Lake Forest Park, Tianfu Square and the charming Jinli Street. Whether travelling for work or leisure, kick-start your mornings with an energising breakfast from The Kitchen, and watch The Bar transition from tea and coffee by day to crafted cocktails by night. Keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre, then cool off at the indoor pool.

hotels.title: Stylish Chengdu Mansion-Style Escape with Indoor Pool, Three Restaurants & Tea House
hotels.description: Step into a Chinese mansion-style escape high above the city in Chengdu’s dynamic Jinjiang District, where timeless elegance meets modern sophistication. Inspired by jade craftsmanship and the Sichuan Opera, this refined retreat crowns the Western International Financial Centre from the 38th floor up, offering sweeping views of the Jinjiang River and the skyline beyond. Dine on bold Sichuan and Cantonese flavours at the hotel's gourmet restaurants and indulge in mahjong, chess and card games while enjoying authentic tea tastings at the Tea House. Relax in the mirrored-ceiling pool or unwind at the spa with rejuvenating treatments. Plus, with Taikoo Li, Chunxi Road, and the beloved panda sanctuaries nearby, this elevated haven is your luxurious gateway to Chengdu’s best.
